question: How do the sounds of a forest change from dawn to dusk, and can you generate an audio simulation of this transition?

steps.content: How do the sounds of a forest change from dawn to dusk, and can you generate an audio simulation of this transition?
Plan: 1) Search for information on how forest sounds change from dawn to dusk. 2) Generate an audio simulation of this transition. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for information on forest sound changes from dawn to dusk.
The sounds of a forest change from the morning chorus of birds at dawn to the buzzing of insects and rustling leaves at midday, and finally to the calls of nocturnal animals at dusk.
Generating an audio simulation of forest sounds transitioning from dawn to dusk.
Audio simulation of forest sounds from dawn to dusk generated.
